subject: Preakness Stakes
Belmont Stakes
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: In the 2:01.36 it took Barbaro to gallop off with a six-and-a-half-length victory in the Kentucky Derby, he was transformed from a versatile colt into a spectacular one.
snippet: In the 2:01.36 it took Barbaro to gallop off with a six-and-a-half-length victory in the Kentucky Derby, he was transformed from a versatile colt into a spectacular one.
